title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.30 - Scope, purpose and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.30 - Scope, purpose and applicability

State Regulations

Sections
382.30
-382.35 of this Part specify
the minimum characteristics a disposal method must have to be acceptable for
use at a land disposal facility. Aboveground disposal methods must meet the
requirements of sections 382.31 through
382.33
of this Part. Belowground
disposal methods must meet the requirements of sections
382.31, 382.32 and
382.34. Underground mined
repositories must meet the requirements of sections 382.31 and
382.35. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
